1.name: The Breakfast Club
1.description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

2.name: The Goonies
2.description: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.

3.name: Back to the Future
3.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

4.name: Rocky IV
4.description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

5.name: Brazil
5.description: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error and becomes an enemy of the state.

6.name: Legend
6.description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from both destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

7.name: Weird Science
7.description: Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.

8.name: Clue
8.description: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

9.name: Witness
9.description: A young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder; policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

10.name: Spies Like Us
10.description: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

11.name: St. Elmo's Fire
11.description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

12.name: Idi i smotri
12.description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

13.name: Perfect
13.description: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

14.name: Cocoon
14.description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

15.name: Pale Rider
15.description: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

16.name: Mask
16.description: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

17.name: Commando
17.description: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

18.name: Red Sonja
18.description: A female Redhead sets out on a killing spree to avenge her family's murder.

19.name: The Color Purple
19.description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

20.name: Return to Oz
20.description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

21.name: Silver Bullet
21.description: A werewolf terrorizes a small city where lives the paralytic Marty Coslaw, his uncle, and his sister, the story's narrator.

22.name: Out of Africa
22.description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

23.name: Teen Wolf
23.description: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

24.name: Better Off Dead...
24.description: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

25.name: The Return of the Living Dead
25.description: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

26.name: The Last Dragon
26.description: In New York City, a young man searches for the "master" to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the glow. Along the way, he must fight a martial arts expert corrupted ...                See full summary »

27.name: The Black Cauldron
27.description: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

28.name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
28.description: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

29.name: Just One of the Guys
29.description: Terry Griffith has got it all -- looks, popularity, the perfect college boyfriend, and an article that's a shoo-in to win her a summer internship at the local newspaper... or so she thinks....                See full summary »

30.name: Desperately Seeking Susan
30.description: A bored suburban housewife, seeking escape from her life, suffers amnesia after an accident, wakes up, and is mistaken for a free-spirited New York City drifter named Susan.

31.name: A Room with a View
31.description: When Lucy Honeychurch and chaperone Charlotte Bartlett find themselves in Florence with rooms without views, fellow guests Mr Emerson and son George step in to remedy the situation. Meeting...                See full summary »

32.name: Silverado
32.description: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

33.name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
33.description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

34.name: A View to a Kill
34.description: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

35.name: After Hours
35.description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

36.name: Explorers
36.description: A boy obsessed with 50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

37.name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
37.description: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

38.name: Ladyhawke
38.description: Philipe Gastone, a thief, escapes from the dungeon at Aquila, sparking a manhunt. He is nearly captured when Captain Navarre befriends him. Navarre has been hunted by the Bishop's men for ...                See full summary »

39.name: Ran
39.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

40.name: Lifeforce
40.description: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

41.name: House
41.description: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

42.name: Flesh+Blood
42.description: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors-commoners.

43.name: Fright Night
43.description: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

44.name: Enemy Mine
44.description: During a long space war, the lives of two wounded enemies becomes dependent on their ability to forgive and to trust.

45.name: Re-Animator
45.description: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

46.name: Brewster's Millions
46.description: A minor league baseball player has to spend thirty million dollars in thirty days, in order to inherit three hundred million dollars. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the deal.

47.name: Real Genius
47.description: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a high-powered laser for a university project. When their professor intends to turn their work into a military weapon, they decide to ruin his plans.

48.name: Phenomena
48.description: A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.

49.name: White Nights
49.description: An expatriate Russian dancer is on a plane forced to land on Soviet territory. He is taken to an apartment in which a black American who has married a Russian woman lives with her. He is to...                See full summary »

50.name: Summer Rental
50.description: An overworked air-traffic controller takes his family on a beach vacation but is soon beset by series of mishaps.
